docetism.belief: Jesus only appeared to be human.
docetism.church: Christ if fully God and fully man.

arianism.church: Christ if fully God and fullyman.

nestorianism.belief: Jesus is two “persons” - Jesus the human son of Mary and Jesus the divine Son of God.
nestorianism.church: Christ is one person with two natures: divine nature and human nature.

monophysitism.belief: Jesus is fully God but not fully man
monophysitism.church: Christ has two natures: divine nature and human nature

monothelitism.church: Christ has two wills: a divine will and a human will belonging to His human soul.

iconoclasm.church: The use of Christian images since Christ became visible through the incarnation.

pelagianism.belief: Denies there's original sin and teaches that grace is not necessary for salvation.
pelagianism.church: We are born in original sin and saved by grace through faith and works.
